title: Inform Visualization
description: Study of computer visualization principles, techniques, and tools used for explaining and understanding symbolic, structured, and/or hierarchical information. Includes data and software visualization.

prerequisites: CS 6750 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 6750 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
